definition: to establish a mapping (of mathematical elements or sets)
details:
verb
- to establish a mapping (of mathematical elements or sets)
= synonyms: map
- bring forward and present to the mind
= synonyms: lay out, present
- point out or draw attention to in protest or remonstrance
= example: point out or draw attention to in protest or remonstrance
- express indirectly by an image, form, or model
= synonyms: stand for, typify, symbolize, symbolise
- describe or present, usually with respect to a particular quality
= example: describe or present, usually with respect to a particular quality
- serve as a means of expressing something
= example: serve as a means of expressing something
- create an image or likeness of
= example: create an image or likeness of
= synonyms: interpret
- perform (a play), especially on a stage
= synonyms: present
- play a role or part
= synonyms: play
- be a delegate or spokesperson for
= example: be a delegate or spokesperson for
- be representative or typical for
= example: be representative or typical for
- be the defense counsel for someone in a trial
= example: be the defense counsel for someone in a trial
= synonyms: defend
- form or compose
= synonyms: make up
- take the place of or be parallel or equivalent to
= synonyms: stand for, correspond
- be characteristic of
= synonyms: characterize, characterise, exemplify
